title: Dr. Julius No

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, transport a SPECTRE agent to the safety of your offshore lab, granting them overprotective defense and detection immunity for the night.
- Alternatively, pick a player. You will learn what slot they take up.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only transport each SPECTRE member to Crab Keys once per member.

fields.name: Scheme:
fields.value: **Keys Crabbed:**Upon completion, All non-SPECTRE players with an investigative ability get dealt an overkill attack instantly. This attack cannot be blocked.

desc:
Post 4197
*Unfortunately I misjudged you, you are just a stupid policeman, whose luck has run out.*
